name: bomp (Harry)
description:
WARNING: I don't know why you're here or why you're downloading this, but thank you for your interest. I'm tinkering with it on and off, so expect any build to be a mess at any given time until decide this would be cool for public consumption.

First mod I ever worked on with an online team was a rainbow six clone on half life engine.

I need practise with unity's animator system.

Those two together make this.

Don't know for sure how this will look as it develops. Going to garden it around playtests.
